title: What will happen too Turtle now that his been replaced by DLift?
body: What will happen? Does this mean his benched?

replies.body: Four months later, so who's better now? :)
Do you know exactly what team Turtle's trying out for?
Gotta be kidding me. He's better than Doublelift. Doublelift only looks good because of those juggerjinx compositions that CLG made. Give turtle the same thing pls, dont replace him.
I love Turtle to death but DLift is a better AD than Turtle. 10x more consistent, stronger laning, better positioning.

> [{quoted}](name=Bookbash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0Xph2rNG,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-01T11:31:13.443+0000)
>
> Gotta be kidding me. He's better than Doublelift. Doublelift only looks good because of those juggerjinx compositions that CLG made. Give turtle the same thing pls, dont replace him.

Turtle is garbage at ADC, I could beat him 1v1 with my eyes closed.

it says hes not on the team anymore. if aphro follows....dayum.....na he seems too egotistical potentially, to just follow his buddy to some other team. he was toxic anyway maybe he doesnt like him. i think the only reason turtle would get picked up by any pro team at all would be because of his long time on such a popular and successful team. you cant say he wasnt a reason tsm did so well. the question is how could some other adc have possibly made tsm a better team? like an adc just more skilled mechanically and maybe communicably, by himself, just being so much better than turtle that tsm would have won worlds 2-3 times. thats pretty unlikely though. so i guess you have to give him some credit,but now lets see liftlift will do
